title: Potato & Celery Root Purée
summary: Potato & Celery Root Purée is a gluten free, fodmap friendly, and vegetarian side dish. This recipe serves 4. For $1.37 per serving, this recipe covers 14% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One serving contains 272 calories, 5g of protein, and 18g of fat. 1 person were glad they tried this recipe. Head to the store and pick up celery root, salt; more, yukon gold potatoes, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 38%. This score is not so awesome. Try Celery Root & Potato Puree, Celery Root And Potato Puree, and Celery Root and Potato Purée for similar recipes.
